name: BurgMan
description:
BurgMAN!

An epic puzzle game where you take control of two buns in a wacky, inverse puzzle where you have to build a burger before impatient guests fork up your plans. 

Control the top bun with WASD and the bottom bun with the ARROW KEYS. Get ALL the ingredients to complete the burger before time is up. 

This 5 level campaign is full of twists and turns.

Team Name: BurgerBoys

Team Members: Cecil Wilber, Kegan Silk, Patrick O'Brien 

Assets not created by us: Music
